metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Regulation of radiation sources. History: Repealed 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 50, sec. 20, effective July 12, 2012. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 386, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 326, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 318, sec. 111, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 70. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 339, sec. 3.
